about.title: About me
about.text-1: Hi there! I'm Phong Phan. My daily life revolves around coding, debugging, and tackling tech challenges. I'm a fast learner, always eager to explore new technologies, and I have a strong passion for problem-solving.
about.text-2: ğŸš€ I always try to learn and develop myself every day. Continuously learning and challenging myself will help me become a better programmer. Besides, I am also very interested in sharing knowledge and experience. I believe that sharing will help me learn more and also help others learn many things.
about.text-3: Beyond coding, I enjoy hitting the gym, playing football, mountain climbing, read book and traveling. Staying active keeps me balanced between work and life while fueling my creativity.
about.text-4: I'm always open to job opportunities that align with my skills and passions. Whether it's joining an innovative startup, working on groundbreaking projects, or collaborating with a top-notch team, I'm excited for new challenges. Let's build something amazing together! ğŸš€
